[Page Title: Events | Park & Grove in Charleston, SC]

Main content starts here, tab to start navigating 
Park & Groove hosts an annual Fall, Holiday, and Spring Edition Market series on  Thursdays from 5:30–8:30pm in October, December, and April.
Calling all vendors, shoppers, & friends who love to eat, drink, & move with the seasons! 
Please fill out the form below to apply as a vendor! We will reach out if your application is accepted. Cheers!
Apply to Be a Vendor 
Tuesday is 1/2 Price Bottles of Wine – all night!

Wednesday is Neighborhood Burger Night

Happy Hour

Park & Groove | New Year Market

[Page Title: Events | Park & Grove in Charleston, SC]

Main content starts here, tab to start navigating 
Special Events
Inquire Today! Explore Event Spaces View Weekly Happenings Slide 1 of 9 Slide 2 of 9 Slide 3 of 9 Slide 4 of 9 Slide 5 of 9 Slide 6 of 9 Slide 7 of 9 Slide 8 of 9 Slide 9 of 9 hero gallery paused, press to play images slides Playing hero gallery, press to pause images slides To book a reservation f or parties of 13 or more, please submit an inquiry form below. For reservations of 9-12 guests, please call us at (843)-410-1070 . For parties of 8 or fewer, make a reservation today on Resy! 
Special Events
Inquire directly to host your next special event with us. Inquire Today 
Explore Event Spaces for Booking Below!

Host your next special event at Park & Grove—the perfect setting for everything from intimate dinners to larger celebrations. Every gathering is thoughtfully curated to create unforgettable moments. With customizable menus, flexible event spaces, and a dedicated team, we’ll help bring your vision to life.

Contact us today to inquire about hosting your private event in the heart of Charleston’s vibrant North Central neighborhood.

Full Restaurant Buyout

For larger gatherings, a Full Restaurant Buyout provides a complete venue experience with indoor seating for 70 and an additional 30 guests in the outdoor patio area.
View More 
Back Dining Room

The Back Dining Room is perfect for semi-private events, accommodating 15-30 guests with options for community-style seating and family-style or pre-set menus.
View More 
Covered Patio

Our private Covered Patio offers an exclusive space for 15-30 guests, with seating at a long community table and the option for indoor seating in the Back Dining Room as backup.
View More Inquire Today 
Galleries

Past Events
